Class cursor_merged 

cursor
   |
   --cursor_merged

Classes extended from cursor_merged:

Located in File: Program_Root/cursor/merged.class.php

Cursor that makes an array of cursors behave like one. 
The last record/cursor that was get()'ed is referred to as the
 'current' cursor.
  • Package - Cursor
  • Access - public

Variable Default Value Description
$_current -><- Last read record.
$_field -><- Currently opened field.
$_is_first ->false<- Last record was first but read with current().
$_is_good ->false<- Do we have a record set?
$_is_queried ->false<- query() was called.
$_key ->0<- Current record key's value.
$_lower -><- Lower cursor.
$_num_gets ->0<- Number of gets that need to be done after wakeup.
$_order ->false<- Last query order.
$_selection ->false<- Last query selection.
$_source -><- Current view's source name.
$_type -><- # Name of SSI.
$_waked_up ->false<- Set, if cursor needs to restore the result set.
